key.name: item-filter
key.description: Filter which items to show. If empty, show all items, if “personal” show personal keys, if “trusted” show trusted.

key.name: sidebar-width
key.description: The default width of the side pane.

key.name: keyrings-selected
key.description: The URIs of the keyrings chosen in the sidebar.

key.name: sort-by
key.summary: The column to sort the Seahorse keys by
key.description: Specify the column to sort the Seahorse key manager main window by. Columns are: “name”, “id”, “validity”, “expires”, “trust”, and “type”. Put a “-” in front of the column name to sort in descending order.
